articles.title: 'All-New Mafia Game' Confirmed to be in Development - IGN
articles.description: Hangar 13 confirmed that it's working on an "all-new" Mafia game that's a "few years away," but stopped short of confirming that it will be Mafia 4.
articles.content:
After months of rumors, Hangar 13 confirmed today that a brand-new Mafia game is under development, though it remains to be seen whether it will be titled Mafia 4.
